title: Imagine God
description: By the end of this book, you will be able to - recognize God and begin to know Him better, regardless of your faith- understand what it really means to be created "in His own image"- contemplate unresolved issues with new insight- reflect on your experiences in a divine way- enlighten others Illustrated by the photograph on the book's cover, author Rick Pribell shares with us his inspirational encounter with the "rising sun" revealing not only the literal truth of scripture in the world, but also the relevance of divine communication in our lives today.
author: Rick Pribell
